Headline: #51 51st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 51st/Lowe
ShortDescription: Eastbound 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 47th, Wells, 51st, LaSalle, 47th and Red Line: due to, street blockage near 51st/Lowe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 47th, Wells, 51st, LaSalle, 47th and Red Line, due to 51st/Lowe near 51st/Lowe.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
